details.part1: Prana Air Breathalyzer is the ultimate portable device for accurate alcohol detection. With its cutting-edge fuel cell technology you can rely on precise and trustworthy results. Ensure safety and peace of mind wherever you go with this highly accurate and convenient breathalyzer.
details.part2: Order yours today and prioritize responsible drinking.

features.title: Qualitative features of the Breathalyzer
features.description: Experience the Power of Precision with our Sleek Compact Alcohol Detector - Your Perfect Companion for Responsible Decisions.

contactless.title: Contactless
contactless.subtitle: Alcohol Detection
contactless.description: Accurately measures BAC (Blood Alcohol Concentration) and alcohol concentration to eliminate drunk driving risks. Make responsible decisions and protect yourself and others on the road with Prana Air Breathalyzer ensuring accurate results.

functions.dimensions_description: Prana Air Breathalyzer: Blending sleek design palm-sized convenience and compact dimensions for effortless portability and accurate alcohol detection on the go.

did_you_know.title: DID YOU KNOW?
did_you_know.description: According to the Traffic Injury Prevention study 2-33% of injured and 6-48% of those who died in road traffic accidents had consumed alcohol. In 2019 there were 12256 accidents caused by drunk driving with 5325 people killed and 10564 injured.

alcohol_test.title: Test Alcohol
alcohol_test.description: Follow these step-by-step instructions to precisely measure the alcohol level in every breath sample.
alcohol_test.power_off_text: The device automatically powers off after 20 seconds of inactivity.
alcohol_test.step1_text: Press the button for a second till the Prana Air Logo and Wait will appear.
alcohol_test.step2_text: Blow when the test bar shows blow for 5-6 seconds until the bar fills.
alcohol_test.bac_explanation: 0.08%BAC means 0.08g (80mg) of alcohol per 100ml of blood.

date_time.title: Setting the Time and Date on Your Breathalyzer
date_time.description: Ensure accurate data logging by setting the correct time and date on your breathalyzer.
date_time.step1_text: Press the button for a second till the Prana Air Logo and Wait will appear.
date_time.step2_text: Once the device is turn on long-press the button to enter settings.
date_time.step3_text: Use short/long presses to adjust time and date and Long-press again to return to the main screen.

history_export.history_description: Easily access past test results along with their date and time to check records anytime and anywhere.
history_export.export_description: Effortlessly export your data for future analysis.
history_export.step1_text: Press and hold the button until the Prana Air logo appears on the screen.
history_export.step2_text: Short-press to view past records with date time and alcohol level.
history_export.step3_text: Connect via Type-C cable enable USB mode and access records in an Excel file.

fuel_cell.subtitle: Type Electrochemical Alcohol tester
fuel_cell.description: Independent Gb05 fuel cell alcohol detector with compact size highly sensitive electrochemical sensor for accurate breath alcohol detection.

bac_standard.subtitle: Standard
bac_standard.description: The permissible BAC in India - 0.03% or 30mg and US/UK - 0.08% or 80mg per 100ml of blood

limit.description: Help maintain responsible drinking habits by using the breathalyzer to gauge your alcohol levels and stay within legal limits.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Prana Air Breathalyzer

q1.question: How does Prana Air Breathalyzer work?
q1.answer: Prana Air Breathalyzer utilizes advanced electrochemical sensors to accurately measure alcohol levels in your breath.

q2.question: How long does it take to get the results?
q2.answer: You can get the results within 10 seconds of blowing into the device providing quick and convenient alcohol level readings.

q3.question: Does Prana Air Breathalyzer detect other substances besides alcohol?
q3.answer: No Prana Air Breathalyzer is specifically designed to measure alcohol levels and does not detect other substances.

q4.question: Is the device easy to use?
q4.answer: Yes the Prana Air Breathalyzer features a user - friendly design with simple one - button operation making it easy for anyone to use.

q5.question: How portable is the Prana Air Breathalyzer?
q5.answer: The device has a sleek and compact design making it highly portable and convenient to carry wherever you go.

q6.question: How accurate is the Prana Air Breathalyzer?
q6.answer: Prana Air Breathalyzer utilizes advanced Gb05 Fuel cell technology providing highly accurate alcohol level measurements for reliable results.

q7.question: Can I export the test data for record-keeping purposes?
q7.answer: Yes Prana Air Breathalyzer allows you to export the test record data to a computer facilitating easy record - keeping in an excel file format.

q8.question: Is Prana Air Breathalyzer suitable for professional use?
q8.answer: Yes the devices high sensitivity stability and precise detection make it suitable for professional applications such as law enforcement workplace safety and alcohol testing centers.
